definition: Austria/Austrian/abbr. for 奧地利|奥地利[Ao4 di4 li4]/Olympic/Olympics/abbr. for 奧林匹克|奥林匹克[Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4]
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all

sentences.english: A few years before Herod's death Augustus wrote to him.
sentences.chinese: 幾年前希律的死亡奧古斯都寫信給他。

sentences.english: We see a statue called "Augustus of Prima Porta".
sentences.chinese: 我們看到一座名爲“第一門的奧古斯都”的雕像。

sentences.english: Augustus and the formation of empire.
sentences.chinese: 奧古斯都及羅馬帝國的形成。

sentences.english: Augustus Caesar ruled as the Emperor of Rome for 41 years.
sentences.chinese: 奧古斯都凱撒統治了羅馬41年之久。

sentences.english: Art experts say the Emperor Augustus was making a victory sign.
sentences.chinese: 藝術專家說奧古斯都皇帝正在展現一個勝利的姿勢。

sentences.english: Augustus appeared on the man's behalf.
sentences.chinese: 奧古斯都於是爲他出庭。

sentences.english: We see a statue called " Augustus of Prima Porta" .
sentences.chinese: 我們看到一尊名爲“第一門的奧古斯都”的雕像。

sentences.english: Augustus instituted boards of curators to take charge of administrative tasks.
sentences.chinese: 奧古斯都曾設立保佐人委員會負責行政事務。

sentences.english: Rome was in its prime in the age of Augustus.
sentences.chinese: 羅馬帝國的全盛期是在奧古斯都時代。
